item.title: New veng problem
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

} public void ChargeSpell() { // Charge Spell { if(playerLevel[6] >= 80) { if(ChargeTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Your a roid monkey."); ChargeTimer = 200; startAnimation(1914); bodygfx(465, absY, absX); addSkillXP(300, 6); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 5); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 5); stayStill(); } else if(ChargeTimer >= 1) { sendMessage("Your Vengeance is still working."); } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 79) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 80 to cast charge."); } }

item.title: New veng problem
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

umm so i couldnt get my last one to work so i wrote this one… but i keep getting these little errors that i try to fix but dont let me. can someoen help me?

client.java:36: illegal start of expression public void ChargeSpell() // Charge Spell ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

{ public void ChargeSpell() // Charge Spell { if(playerLevel[6] >= 80) { if(ChargeTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Your a roid monkey."); ChargeTimer = 200; startAnimation(1914); bodygfx(465, absY, absX); addSkillXP(300, 6); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 5); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 5); stayStill(); } else if(ChargeTimer >= 1) { sendMessage("Your Vengeance is still working."); } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 79) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 80 to cast charge."); } }
